targets.query: SELECT mean("total_cpu_one_minute") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-wdsysmon-fd-oper:system-monitoring/cpu-utilization" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/ AND "node_name" = '0/RP0/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("total-cpu-one-minute") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-wdsysmon-fd-oper:system-monitoring/cpu-utilization" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("total-cpu-one-minute") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-wdsysmon-fd-oper:system-monitoring/cpu-utilization" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("total-cpu-one-minute") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-wdsysmon-fd-oper:system-monitoring/cpu-utilization" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (last("system_ram_memory") - last("free_application_memory")) * 100 / last("system_ram_memory") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-nto-misc-oper:memory-summary/nodes/node/summary" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/ AND "node_name" = '0/RP0/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (last("system_ram_memory") - last("free_application_memory")) * 100 / last("system_ram_memory") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-nto-misc-oper:memory-summary/nodes/node/summary" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/ AND "node_name" = '0/RSP0/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (last("system_ram_memory") - last("free_application_memory")) * 100 / last("system_ram_memory") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-nto-misc-oper:memory-summary/nodes/node/summary" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/ AND "node_name" = '0/RP1/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (last("system_ram_memory") - last("free_application_memory")) * 100 / last("system_ram_memory") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-nto-misc-oper:memory-summary/nodes/node/summary" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/ AND "node_name" = '0/RSP1/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("interface-counts__interface-count") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-pfi-im-cmd-oper:interfaces/interface-summary" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT ("system_ram_memory" - "free_application_memory") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-nto-misc-oper:memory-summary/nodes/node/summary" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/ AND "node_name" = '0/RP0/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "node_name"

SELECT ("system_ram_memory" - "free_application_memory") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-nto-misc-oper:memory-summary/nodes/node/summary" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/ AND "node_name" = '0/RSP0/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "node_name"

SELECT ("system_ram_memory" - "free_application_memory") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-nto-misc-oper:memory-summary/nodes/node/summary" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/ AND "node_name" = '0/RP1/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "node_name"

SELECT ("system_ram_memory" - "free_application_memory") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-nto-misc-oper:memory-summary/nodes/node/summary" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/ AND "node_name" = '0/RSP1/CPU0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "node_name"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("bytes-received", 1s) *8 FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-statsd-oper:infra-statistics/interfaces/interface/latest/generic-counters" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "interface-name"

SELECT distinct("lane-data__receive-power")  / 100 FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-controller-optics-oper:optics-oper/optics-ports/optics-port/optics-info" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$Node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name", "lane-data__lane-index"
